channel.title: Sound on Kaho Abe 阿部香穂

item.title: Digital Euthanasia
item.description: Summary Digital Euthanasia is a 30 second science fiction radio play about the first cat to be digitally euthanized. Made with voice recordings, composed music and Pro Tools. Voice of Cat Owner: Daniel London Voice of Cat: Sammy
